question_text:
Question 38
The machining process that involves ablation is
Production Engineering (Non Conventional Machining Method)
(A) Abrasive Jet Machining 
(B) Chemical Machining
(C) Laser Beam Machining
 
(D) Electrochemical Machining  
Ans. 
C
explanation_text:
Sol.
 
Ablation involves in laser beam machining.
Hence, the correct option is (C).
